title: Hero headline + circular logo framing + local modern welding hero background

requirements.summary: Update the hero main headline text to exactly match the requested wording without “Complete”.
acceptanceCriteria: HeroSection no longer displays the word "Complete" in the main headline.
The main hero headline text renders exactly as: "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions".

file_operations.description: Replace the current hero <h1> text so it renders exactly: "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions" (remove the word “Complete”).

requirements.summary: Render the logo inside a circular frame in both the top navigation and the hero branding area.
acceptanceCriteria: The logo in the top navigation renders as a circle (e.g., with a circular mask/frame) on desktop and mobile.
The logo in the hero section renders as a circle (e.g., with a circular mask/frame).
No other layout regressions occur in the top navigation or hero section after the logo shape change.

file_operations.description: Update the logo styling to present as a circular frame/mask (e.g., rounded-full + appropriate object-fit and optional ring/border) without affecting header layout on desktop/mobile.
Update the hero branding logo styling to present as a circular frame/mask (e.g., rounded-full + appropriate object-fit and optional ring/border) without affecting hero layout.

requirements.summary: Add and use a local, modern welding-themed hero background image with an overlay to maintain readable text and CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero/Home section background includes a modern welding-themed image/visual.
Hero text and CTAs remain clearly readable over the background across common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop).
The background image is served from local static assets (not a remote URL).

file_operations.description: Add the required local static hero background image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-welding-modern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png.

Replace the current gradient-only hero background with the local static image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-welding-modern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png (no remote URLs). Add an overlay/tint (and keep existing decorative grid subtle) to ensure heading, subheading, and buttons have adequate contrast/readability across mobile/tablet/desktop breakpoints.
